name: I'm Thinking of Ending Things
summary_text: Full of misgivings, a young woman travels with her new boyfriend to his parents' secluded farm. Upon arriving, she comes to question everything she thought she knew about him, and herself.

name: Romeo Must Die
summary_text: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

name: Redemption
summary_text: A damaged ex-special forces soldier navigating London's criminal underworld seizes an opportunity to assume another man's identity.

name: Peter Pan
summary_text: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

name: Seabiscuit
summary_text: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

name: Anomalisa
summary_text: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

name: The Best of Me
summary_text: A pair of former high school sweethearts reunite after many years when they return to visit their small hometown.

name: The First Time
summary_text: A shy senior and a down-to-earth junior fall in love over one weekend.

name: Bowfinger
summary_text: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

name: Badlands
summary_text: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

name: Manhunter
summary_text: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

name: District B13
summary_text: In the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and an ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

name: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
summary_text: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

name: Land of the Lost
summary_text: A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.

name: Little Shop of Horrors
summary_text: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

name: Children of Heaven
summary_text: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
summary_text: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

name: Hunger
summary_text: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.

name: Child 44
summary_text: A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.

name: Happiness
summary_text: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

name: Invincible
summary_text: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

name: Sorry to Bother You
summary_text: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.

name: The Gambler
summary_text: Literature professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation, is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?

name: Beethoven
summary_text: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

name: Underwater
summary_text: A crew of oceanic researchers working for a deep sea drilling company try to get to safety after a mysterious earthquake devastates their deepwater research and drilling facility located at the bottom of the Mariana Trench.

name: Dark Waters
summary_text: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

name: Street Fighter
summary_text: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

name: Act of Valor
summary_text: An elite team of Navy SEALs embark on a covert mission to recover a kidnapped CIA agent.

name: Scary Movie V
summary_text: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.

name: A Dog's Purpose
summary_text: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

name: Being There
summary_text: A simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

name: Four Christmases
summary_text: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

name: Agora
summary_text: A historical drama set in Roman Egypt, concerning a slave who turns to the rising tide of Christianity in the hope of pursuing freedom while falling in love with his mistress, the philosophy and mathematics professor Hypatia of Alexandria.

name: Stripes
summary_text: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

name: To Catch a Thief
summary_text: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

name: Funny Games
summary_text: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
summary_text: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

name: Robin Hood
summary_text: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.

name: Mysterious Skin
summary_text: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

name: Mandy
summary_text: The enchanted lives of a couple in a secluded forest are brutally shattered by a nightmarish hippie cult and their demon-biker henchmen, propelling a man into a spiraling, surreal rampage of vengeance.

name: Chungking Express
summary_text: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

name: The Eagle
summary_text: In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.

name: A Very Harold & Kumar Christmas
summary_text: Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.

name: Miss Sloane
summary_text: In the high-stakes world of political power-brokers, Elizabeth Sloane is the most sought after and formidable lobbyist in D.C. But when taking on the most powerful opponent of her career, she finds winning may come at too high a price.

name: Two Night Stand
summary_text: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand as the blizzard goes through the night.

name: Johnny English Strikes Again
summary_text: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

name: Gulliver's Travels
summary_text: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda but ends up on the island of Lilliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

name: Frankenstein
summary_text: Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.

name: The Rainmaker
summary_text: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

name: Windtalkers
summary_text: Two U.S. Marines in World War II are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

name: Three Colors: White
summary_text: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

name: Anna
summary_text: Beneath Anna Poliatova's striking beauty lies a secret that will unleash her indelible strength and skill to become one of the world's most feared government assassins.

name: Wings of Desire
summary_text: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

name: Run, Fat Boy, Run
summary_text: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back.

name: Hackers
summary_text: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

name: The Debt
summary_text: In 1965, three Mossad Agents cross into East Berlin to apprehend a notorious Nazi war criminal. Thirty years later, the secrets the Agents share come back to haunt them.

name: Bandits
summary_text: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.

name: Red Heat
summary_text: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

name: House of Sand and Fog
summary_text: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
summary_text: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of fifty thousand dollars first.

name: Junior
summary_text: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

name: Shoplifters
summary_text: A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.

name: Arsenic and Old Lace
summary_text: A writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation when he decides to get married. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.

name: The Book of Life
summary_text: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

name: Turner & Hooch
summary_text: A detective must adopt a rambunctious dog in order to help him find a killer.

name: Zoolander 2
summary_text: Derek and Hansel are lured into modelling again, in Rome, where they find themselves the target of a sinister conspiracy.

name: Into the Storm
summary_text: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.

name: The Fog
summary_text: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

name: Sadak 2
summary_text: The film picks up where Sadak left off, revolving around the journey with a young girl who becomes an important character in the life of the protagonist, and the reason for him to stay alive.

name: Quiz Show
summary_text: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

name: The Ten Commandments
summary_text: Moses, an Egyptian Prince, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

name: The Bandit
summary_text: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

name: Dangerous Liaisons
summary_text: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

name: The City of Lost Children
summary_text: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

name: Death Wish
summary_text: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

name: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
summary_text: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel.

name: Eighth Grade
summary_text: An introverted teenage girl tries to survive the last week of her disastrous eighth grade year before leaving to start high school.

name: Richie Rich
summary_text: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

name: Indecent Proposal
summary_text: A billionaire offers one million dollars to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

name: Domino
summary_text: A recounting of Domino Harvey's life story. The daughter of actor Laurence Harvey turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

name: Krampus
summary_text: A boy who has a bad Christmas accidentally summons a festive demon to his family home.

name: Stigmata
summary_text: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.

name: Superman III
summary_text: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

name: True Story
summary_text: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

name: Magic in the Moonlight
summary_text: A romantic comedy about an Englishman brought in to help unmask a possible swindle. Personal and professional complications ensue.

name: Joy Ride
summary_text: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

name: A Simple Plan
summary_text: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

name: The Wicker Man
summary_text: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

name: Open Your Eyes
summary_text: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

name: Bringing Out the Dead
summary_text: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

name: Ringu
summary_text: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

name: Spawn
summary_text: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

name: Daddy Day Care
summary_text: Two men, Charlie Hinton (Eddie Murphy) and Phil Ryerson (Jeff Garlin), get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

name: Beerfest
summary_text: Two brothers travel to Germany for Oktoberfest, only to stumble upon a secret, centuries-old competition described as a "Fight Club" with beer games.

name: Road House
summary_text: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

name: Rust and Bone
summary_text: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

name: Dead Snow
summary_text: A ski vacation turns horrific for a group of medical students, as they find themselves confronted by an unimaginable menace: Nazi zombies.

name: Celda 211
summary_text: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

name: The Gift
summary_text: A fortune teller with extrasensory perception is asked to help find a young woman who has mysteriously disappeared.

name: The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc
summary_text: A young girl receives a vision that drives her to rid France of its oppressors.

name: Isn't It Romantic
summary_text: A young woman disenchanted with love mysteriously finds herself trapped inside a romantic comedy.

name: Whip It
summary_text: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with small-town misery after discovering a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

name: The Philadelphia Story
summary_text: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

name: Larry Crowne
summary_text: After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

name: Superhero Movie
summary_text: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

name: Chernobyl Diaries
summary_text: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

name: Suspiria
summary_text: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare. Others will finally wake up.

name: Sliding Doors
summary_text: A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.

name: Dead Man Down
summary_text: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is helped by a woman seeking retribution.

name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
summary_text: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

name: The Forgotten
summary_text: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.

name: The November Man
summary_text: An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
summary_text: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

name: Daddy's Home 2
summary_text: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

name: Arachnophobia
summary_text: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

name: The Man from Nowhere
summary_text: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

name: Duel
summary_text: A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by the malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.

name: Day of the Dead
summary_text: As the world is overrun by zombies, a small group of scientists and military personnel dwelling in an underground bunker in Florida must determine whether they should educate, eliminate or escape the undead horde.

name: Dream House
summary_text: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

name: The Blue Lagoon
summary_text: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

name: El Mariachi
summary_text: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

name: Bloodshot
summary_text: Ray Garrison, a slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

name: Paddington 2
summary_text: Paddington (Ben Whishaw), now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's (Imelda Staunton's) 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

name: The Dead Zone
summary_text: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

name: Jersey Girl
summary_text: A widower must look after his precocious daughter and rebuild his life and career after he's sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup.

name: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance
summary_text: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

name: Machine Gun Preacher
summary_text: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing biker tough guy who found God and became a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

name: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
summary_text: On Halloween 1968, Stella and her two friends meet a mysterious drifter, Ramón, and uncover a sinister notebook of stories.

name: The Awakening
summary_text: In 1921, England is overwhelmed by the loss and grief of World War I. Hoax exposer Florence Cathcart visits a boarding school to explain sightings of a child ghost. Everything she believes unravels as the 'missing' begin to show themselves.

name: What About Bob?
summary_text: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

name: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
summary_text: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

name: Sisters
summary_text: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

name: Harsh Times
summary_text: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

name: Brotherhood of the Wolf
summary_text: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

name: That Thing You Do!
summary_text: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one-hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from their manager.

name: Aloha
summary_text: A celebrated military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and reconnects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the hard-charging Air Force watch-dog assigned to him.

name: The Witches of Eastwick
summary_text: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

name: Charlie Bartlett
summary_text: A rich kid becomes the self-appointed psychiatrist to the student body of his new high school.

name: Hamilton
summary_text: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

name: The Signal
summary_text: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.

name: City of Ember
summary_text: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

name: Showgirls
summary_text: Nomi, a young drifter, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

name: The Informant!
summary_text: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.

name: Breaking the Waves
summary_text: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

name: The Saint
summary_text: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

name: Cube²: Hypercube
summary_text: Eight strangers awaken with no memory, in a puzzling cube-shaped room where the laws of physics do not always apply.

name: The Fundamentals of Caring
summary_text: A man suffering a family loss enrolls in a class about care-giving that changes his perspective on life.

name: The Specialist
summary_text: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

name: Major League
summary_text: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

name: Good Boys
summary_text: Three 6th grade boys ditch school and embark on an epic journey while carrying accidentally stolen drugs, being hunted by teenage girls, and trying to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party.

name: Mystery Men
summary_text: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

name: Never Say Never Again
summary_text: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

name: The Family Stone
summary_text: An uptight, conservative businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

name: The Christmas Chronicles
summary_text: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

name: Paranormal Activity 4
summary_text: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.

name: Ella Enchanted
summary_text: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

name: The Dark Crystal
summary_text: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

name: The Finest Hours
summary_text: The Coast Guard makes a daring rescue attempt off the coast of Cape Cod after a pair of oil tankers are destroyed during a blizzard in 1952.

name: In the Mouth of Madness
summary_text: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

name: I Heart Huckabees
summary_text: A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues, the kind that keep you up at night, wondering what it all means.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge
summary_text: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

name: 13 Assassins
summary_text: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

name: A Ghost Story
summary_text: In this singular exploration of legacy, love, loss, and the enormity of existence, a recently deceased, white-sheeted ghost returns to his suburban home to try to reconnect with his bereft wife.

name: Red State
summary_text: Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.

name: Fright Night
summary_text: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

name: The Devil's Backbone
summary_text: After Carlos - a 12-year-old whose father has died in the Spanish Civil War - arrives at an ominous boys' orphanage, he discovers the school is haunted and has many dark secrets which he must uncover.

name: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen
summary_text: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

name: Nobody
summary_text: A bystander who intervenes to help a woman being harassed by a group of men becomes the target of a vengeful drug lord.

name: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
summary_text: When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

name: Legally Blonde 2
summary_text: Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

name: Robot & Frank
summary_text: In the near future, an ex-jewel thief receives a gift from his son: a robot butler programmed to look after him. But soon the two companions try their luck as a heist team.

name: Jeff, Who Lives at Home
summary_text: Dispatched from his basement room on an errand for his widowed mother, slacker Jeff might discover his destiny (finally) when he spends the day with his unhappily married brother as he tracks his possibly adulterous wife.

name: Outlaw King
summary_text: A true David vs. Goliath story of how the 14th century Scottish 'Outlaw King' Robert the Bruce used cunning and bravery to defeat the much larger and better equipped occupying English army.

name: Come and See
summary_text: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

name: Control
summary_text: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

name: Bullitt
summary_text: An all-guts, no-glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

name: Mr. Holmes
summary_text: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with dementia, as he tries to remember his final case, and a mysterious woman, whose memory haunts him. He also befriends a fan, the young son of his housekeeper, who wants him to work again.

name: Diabolique
summary_text: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

name: Elle
summary_text: A successful businesswoman gets caught up in a game of cat and mouse as she tracks down the unknown man who raped her.

name: Raw
summary_text: A young woman, studying to be a vet, develops a craving for human flesh.

name: Wonder Boys
summary_text: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

name: Stepmom
summary_text: A terminally-ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.

name: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
summary_text: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.

name: The House That Jack Built
summary_text: The story follows Jack, a highly intelligent serial killer, over the course of twelve years, and depicts the murders that really develop his inner madman.

name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
summary_text: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

name: Eight Below
summary_text: Brutal cold forces two Antarctic explorers to leave their team of sled dogs behind as they fend for their survival.

name: TMNT
summary_text: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

name: The Stepford Wives
summary_text: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association.

name: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
summary_text: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

name: The Client
summary_text: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

name: The Net
summary_text: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

name: After Hours
summary_text: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho who he met that evening at a coffee shop.

name: Black Snake Moan
summary_text: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

name: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
summary_text: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

name: Urban Legend
summary_text: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

name: Happy Death Day 2U
summary_text: Tree Gelbman discovers that dying over and over was surprisingly easier than the dangers that lie ahead.

name: Dorian Gray
summary_text: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

name: Brooklyn's Finest
summary_text: Three unconnected Brooklyn cops wind up at the same deadly location after enduring vastly different career paths.

name: Kiss of the Dragon
summary_text: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

name: Queen
summary_text: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

name: Top Secret!
summary_text: Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.

name: The Hills Have Eyes 2
summary_text: A group of National Guard trainees find themselves battling against a vicious group of mutants on their last day of training in the desert.

name: Waking Life
summary_text: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

name: The Mighty Ducks
summary_text: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

name: Observe and Report
summary_text: Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective is recruited to close the case.

name: James and the Giant Peach
summary_text: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

name: Pan
summary_text: Twelve-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny -- to become the hero who will be for ever known as Peter Pan.

name: Runner Runner
summary_text: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.

name: Showtime
summary_text: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based television cop show, while tracking down the manufacturer and distributor of an illegally made semi-automatic firearm.

name: Legend
summary_text: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

name: News of the World
summary_text: A Civil War veteran agrees to deliver a girl, taken by the Kiowa people years ago, to her aunt and uncle, against her will. They travel hundreds of miles and face grave dangers as they search for a place that either can call home.

name: The Devil's Own
summary_text: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

name: Trouble with the Curve
summary_text: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout, by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

name: The Man with the Iron Fists
summary_text: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.

name: Goal! The Dream Begins
summary_text: The extremely talented Santiago Muñez is spotted by a Newcastle United scout and given a chance at professional football.

name: Perfect Blue
summary_text: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

name: Criminal
summary_text: In a last-ditch effort to stop a diabolical plot, a dead CIA operative's memories, secrets, and skills are implanted into a death-row inmate in hopes that he will complete the operative's mission.

name: Silent Hill: Revelation
summary_text: When her adoptive father disappears, Sharon Da Silva is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

name: The Midnight Meat Train
summary_text: A photographer's obsessive pursuit of dark subject matter leads him into the path of a serial killer who stalks late night commuters, ultimately butchering them in the most gruesome ways.

name: Anatomy of a Murder
summary_text: In a murder trial, the defendant says he suffered temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

name: Wimbledon
summary_text: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

name: Timeline
summary_text: A group of archaeologists become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve a friend. The group must survive in fourteenth century France before they can escape back to the twenty-first century.

name: Penelope
summary_text: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with "one who will accept her as one of their own."

name: Blood Father
summary_text: An ex-con reunites with his estranged wayward 17-year old daughter to protect her from drug dealers who are trying to kill her.

name: The Devil's Double
summary_text: A chilling vision of the House of Saddam Hussein comes to life through the eyes of the man who was forced to become the double of Hussein's sadistic son.

name: Punisher: War Zone
summary_text: Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

name: Papillon
summary_text: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

name: Shadow of a Doubt
summary_text: A young girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

name: Coffee and Cigarettes
summary_text: A series of vignettes that all have coffee and cigarettes in common.

name: Annabelle Comes Home
summary_text: While babysitting the daughter of Ed and Lorraine Warren, a teenager and her friend unknowingly awaken an evil spirit trapped in a doll.

name: Friday the 13th Part 2
summary_text: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant.

name: Blast from the Past
summary_text: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

name: Sabrina
summary_text: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

name: Brawl in Cell Block 99
summary_text: A former boxer-turned-drug runner lands in a prison battleground after a deal gets deadly.

name: Only the Brave
summary_text: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

name: K-19: The Widowmaker
summary_text: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

name: When in Rome
summary_text: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

name: What a Girl Wants
summary_text: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

name: Colossal
summary_text: Gloria is an out-of-work party girl forced to leave her life in New York City and move back home. When reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she gradually comes to the realization that she is somehow connected to this phenomenon.

name: Sabotage
summary_text: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

name: Dark Water
summary_text: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building, where they are targeted by the ghost of a former resident.

name: Basic
summary_text: A D.E.A. Agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army Ranger Drill Sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.

name: The Game Plan
summary_text: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

name: The Legend of 1900
summary_text: A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

name: Charlie's Angels
summary_text: When a young systems engineer blows the whistle on a dangerous technology, Charlie's Angels are called into action, putting their lives on the line to protect us all.

name: In Her Shoes
summary_text: Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

name: The Chaser
summary_text: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

name: Cold Pursuit
summary_text: A grieving snowplow driver seeks out revenge against the drug dealers who killed his son.

name: Far and Away
summary_text: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

name: Fish Tank
summary_text: Everything changes for 15-year-old Mia when her mum brings home a new boyfriend.
